sentences.en: A single candle illuminated his face.
sentences.cn: 一支蜡烛照亮了他的脸。

sentences.en: Added new more accurate Illuminate Wave effect provided by eva 00 r.
sentences.cn: 增加了冲击波(光法的)的更精确的效果,由eva00r提供.

sentences.en: Adjust to illuminate to act for the vogue trend of product.
sentences.cn: 顺应着照明替代产品的时尚趋势.

sentences.en: An application example is implemented to illuminate the feasibility of the scheme.
sentences.cn: 应用实例说明了该方案的可行性.

sentences.en: At night the canals are beautifully illuminated.
sentences.cn: 晚上运河灯火辉煌，美景毕现。

sentences.en: But moons ray still might illuminate enters your room.
sentences.cn: 但月亮的光芒仍可照进你的房间.

sentences.en: Fixed Illuminate's interaction with Cliffs and units very close to it.
sentences.cn: 这个应该是修正了UG之忍的移动问题.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE : To illuminate the application of Melaleuca Alternifolia oil in medicine.
sentences.cn: 目的: 阐明白千层油在医药上的应用价值.

sentences.en: Observations of the ring continue to illuminate the endgame of the star.
sentences.cn: 对环圈的观测,持续阐明了恒星的生命如何进入尾声.

sentences.en: Our interesting teacher could illuminate almost any subject we studied.
sentences.cn: 我们这位有趣的老师几乎能解释清楚我们所学的所有科目.

sentences.en: PET images illuminate the cancer cells and can see time biochemical functions.
sentences.cn: 探头称为脱氧葡萄糖,PET显像照亮了癌细胞,可以看到实时生化功能.

sentences.en: So powerful is the unity that it can illuminate the whole earth!
sentences.cn: 团结就是力量,它能够照亮整个地球!

sentences.en: The report illuminated the difficult issues at the heart of science policy.
sentences.cn: 报告阐明了科学方针核心部分的难点。

sentences.en: Then we illuminate the design method of the main parameter.
sentences.cn: 说明了根据探测要求设计主要参数的方法.

sentences.en: They use games and drawings to illuminate their subject.
sentences.cn: 他们用游戏和图画来阐明他们的主题。

sentences.en: Tom squeezed his small body behind it in order to illuminate it for Becky's gratification.
sentences.cn: 汤姆挤到后边,好让贝基借着他的灯光看个够.

sentences.en: We illuminate the enemy plane with searchlights in order to shoot at it.
sentences.cn: 我们用探照灯照射敌机为的是向其射击.

sentences.en: Went, just pat two pieces to illuminate come back?
sentences.cn: 去了, 难道只是拍两张照就回来 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 照亮的，照明的；启蒙的，有启发性的
照明；启发；兴奋（illuminate的过去分词）
照明，阐释（illuminate的现在分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 阐明，说明；照亮；使灿烂；用灯装饰
trans.tran_en: to make a light shine on something, or to fill a place with light

trans.tran_cn: 照亮，照明，阐明，说明，装饰，使灿烂
trans.tran_en: to make a light shine on something, or to fill a place with light
